name: Wacky Mole (AlastairJones)
description:
"Welcome to Whacky Mole, the simple yet fun whack-a-mole game with upgrades! Make it through every level and whack all those moles!"

  • 3-5 minute playtime.
  • Simple Mouse Movement Over Moles with E to Repair
  • Too many Moles

If you enjoyed this game, be sure to follow!
